attributes.action: Freeze/Suspend Household Bills For Everyone Affected By Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Many people are really worried of the effects of the Coronavirus will have on daily lifes and living. The gov is asking people to self isolated who is over a certain age, pregnant, long term illnesses (me included) to stay Indoors and follow guidelines. My career/husband is worried to go outside because of my illnesses and immune system. SSP payments wouldn’t even cover our rent and many others rent/bills. Many other EU countries are already doing much more to freeze/suspend household bills.
attributes.background: Due to the Coronavirus many individuals and companies are being massively affected by the virus that is currently impacting the UK and everyone across the world. I am asking for this UK govement/Parliament to introduce emergency laws for the government to freeze/suspend all household bills.
